Item.Name: Potion
Item.Description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Super Potion
Item.Description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Hyper Potion
Item.Description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Max Potion
Item.Effect: Heals a Pokémon to its full HP.
Item.Description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It will completely restore the max HP of a single Pokémon.

Item.Name: Full Restore
Item.Effect: Heals a Pokémon to its full HP and restores all status conditions.
Item.Description: A medicine that can be used to fully restore the HP of a single Pokémon and heal any status conditions it has.

Item.Name: Secret Potion
Item.Effect: Heals an ailing Pokémon on the field as part of the storyline of the game.
Item.Description: A fantastic medicine dispensed by the pharmacy in Cianwood City. It fully heals a Pokémon of any ailment.

Item.Name: Fresh Water
Item.Description: Water with a high mineral content. When consumed, it restores up to 30 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Soda Pop
Item.Description: A highly carbonated soda drink. When consumed, it restores up to 50 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Lemonade
Item.Description: A very sweet and refreshing drink. When consumed, it restores up to 70 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Moomoo Milk
Item.Description: A bottle of highly nutritious milk. When consumed, it restores up to 100 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Berry Juice
Item.Effect: Restores 20 HP. Can be activated as a held item.
Item.Description: A 100 percent pure juice made of Berries. When consumed, it restores 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Tea
Item.Effect: Give it to the Saffron City guards to be granted access to the city.
Item.Description: A thirst-quenching tea prepared by an old lady.

Item.Name: Revive
Item.Effect: Restores a fainted Pokémon to half of its full HP.
Item.Description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also restores half of a fainted Pokémon's maximum HP.

Item.Name: Max Revive
Item.Effect: Restores a fainted Pokémon, completely restoring its HP.
Item.Description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also fully restores a fainted Pokémon's maximum HP.

Item.Name: Sacred Ash
Item.Effect: When used from the Bag, Sacred Ash fully restores the HP of all fainted Pokémon in the party. It can only be used outside of battle. It is consumed after use.
Item.Description: This rare ash can revive all fainted Pokémon in a party. In doing so, it also fully restores their maximum HP.

Item.Name: Energy Powder
Item.Effect: Restores a Pokémon by 60 HP but lowers friendship.
Item.Description: A very bitter medicinal powder. When consumed, it restores up to 60 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Energy Root
Item.Effect: Restores a Pokémon by 120 HP but lowers friendship.
Item.Description: An extremely bitter medicinal root. When consumed, it restores up to 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.

Item.Name: Revival Herb
Item.Effect: Revives a fainted Pokémon and restores it to full HP but lowers friendship.
Item.Description: A terribly bitter medicinal herb. It revives a fainted Pokémon and fully restores its maximum HP.
